name: Vegan Mozzarella Sticks
description: Vegan Mozzarella Sticks are perfectly cheesy on the inside and crunchy on the outside. They’re so easy to make and taste just like the dairy version!
recipeIngredient: 1 Recipe Shreddable Vegan Mozzarella (OR a block of store bought vegan mozzarella)
peanut or vegetable oil, for frying

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a batch of Shreddable Vegan Mozzarella, or get out another store bought vegan mozzarella block, and cut into sticks 2-3 inches long, 1/2 inch wide.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare a batch of Shreddable Vegan Mozzarella, or get out another store bought vegan mozzarella block, and cut into sticks 2-3 inches long, 1/2 inch wide.

recipeInstructions.text: Gather 3 shallow bowls. In the first, add the flour. In the second, whisk the almond milk and cornstarch. In the third, stir the breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning and garlic powder together.
recipeInstructions.name: Gather 3 shallow bowls. In the first, add the flour. In the second, whisk the almond milk and cornstarch. In the third, stir the breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning and garlic powder together.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip each cheese stick into the flour to coat, then into the milk/cornstarch, then into the bowl with the breadcrumbs and pat to coat the cheese stick. Use one hand for the dry bowls, and your other hand for the wet bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Dip each cheese stick into the flour to coat, then into the milk/cornstarch, then into the bowl with the breadcrumbs and pat to coat the cheese stick. Use one hand for the dry bowls, and your other hand for the wet bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Place onto the lined baking sheet and place in the freezer for at least 1 hour. This is so that the cheese won’t melt before the crumbs get crispy! Overnight works as well.
recipeInstructions.name: Place onto the lined baking sheet and place in the freezer for at least 1 hour. This is so that the cheese won’t melt before the crumbs get crispy! Overnight works as well.

recipeInstructions.text: To fry: After freezing, get out a large pot and fill it with oil 2-3 inches deep. Use a thermometer to make sure the oil is heated to 350 degrees F, then place the cheese sticks in the oil and fry for 2-3 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oil and place on a paper towel lined plate.
recipeInstructions.name: To fry: After freezing, get out a large pot and fill it with oil 2-3 inches deep. Use a thermometer to make sure the oil is heated to 350 degrees F, then place the cheese sticks in the oil and fry for 2-3 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oil and place on a paper towel lined plate.

recipeInstructions.text: Or bake: After freezing, preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Remove the pan from the freezer and spray the tops of the sticks with oil. Bake for about 8-10 minutes until the cheese is warm and the outside is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Or bake: After freezing, preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Remove the pan from the freezer and spray the tops of the sticks with oil. Bake for about 8-10 minutes until the cheese is warm and the outside is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with marinara sauce for dipping and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with marinara sauce for dipping and enjoy!

keywords: dairy free mozzarella sticks, vegan mozzarella sticks
